location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant George Herne, commanding the HC cruizer Nautilusat Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū], to Captain Charles Sealy aboard the HC cruizer Ternate

mods.abstract: Lieutenant George Herne informs Captain Charles Sealy that one of the boats known to have committed an act of piracy off Rasull Head [Ḥadd, Ra's al, cape] was hauled on shore and deserted by her crew, once they had obtained information that she was to be intercepted by a cruizer. Lieutenant George Herne then reports taking possession of the boat, getting her afloat with some difficulty and towing her away.
